attributes.action: call on Post Office Ltd not to close Kennerleigh Post Office in Devon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kennerleigh Post Office is a rural post office in Devon under threat of closure by Post Office Ltd.
If the post office closes, we will loose our wonderful shop and will have to drive several miles for supplies, indeed many of our residents do not drive.  We have just one bus a week here and many of us would be UNABLE to make the 8 mile round trip to the next post office and shop.   
Please sign our petition and help us to stop Post Office Ltd from ripping the heart out of our community.
